org.webcurator.ui.common.taglib
Class Functions

java.lang.Object
  org.webcurator.ui.common.taglib.Functions

public class Functions
extends java.lang.Object

This class provides a collection of functions that can be used within the JSTL expressions in a JSP tag.

Author:
bbeaumont

Method Detail

contains

public static boolean contains(java.util.Collection coll,
                               int val)
Test whether an int value is contained within a collection.

Parameters:
coll - The collection to test membership of.
val - The int value to find.
Returns:
true if the value is in the collection; otherwise false.

containsObj

public static boolean containsObj(java.util.Collection coll,
                                  java.lang.Object val)
Tests whether the object is within the specified collection.

Parameters:
coll - The collection to test membership of.
val - The value to find.
Returns:
true if the object is in the collection; otherwise false.

xHoursElapsed

public static boolean xHoursElapsed(int xHours,
                                    java.util.Date theDate)
Tests whether the specified number of hours have elapsed since the specified date.

Parameters:
xHours - The specified number of hours.
theDate - The date to check.
Returns:
true if the current time (now) is more than xHours after the input date; otherwise false.
